newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Jurong Engineering in Thai deals.
newsitem.headline: Jurong Engineering in Thai deals.

text.p: Jurong Engineering Ltd said on Friday that its consortium has received a letter of intent for two power projects in Thailand worth about US$133 million.
A company statement said Jurong and National Energy Production Company (Nepco) of the United States received the letter of intent for two small private power enterprise projects.

The turnkey engineering, procurement and construction contract is to build a 122 MW co-generation power plant at Rojana Industrial Park and also a similar 122 MW plant at Saha Pathana Industrial Park.
The total contract value for both projects is about US$133 million and they are scheduled for completion in 23-1/2 months.

Jurong said 25 percent of the electricity generated would be captive power for the respective industrial estates and the remaining 75 percent would be supplied to the Electricity Authority of Thailand.
